page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AMANDA
page.content: I get up at 7.30 in the morning,get washed and brush my teeth,then run downstairs and have breakfast of toast and a cup of tea.After breakfast I pack my bag ready for school,and at 8.40 I am picked up by car and taken to school.We start school at 9.00 am then I take my place at my desk and do the work that is set for me.At playtime I play hide and seek with the rest of the children.Lessons follow but soon it is dinner time;I have a packed lunch,my favourite being cheese sandwiches,a chocolate biscuit and a packet of crisps,with a drink.School finishes at 3.30pm and when I go home I play out until 5.30pm;then I go inside for tea.My favourite tea is pizza and chips.Then I go and play with my friends until I come in at 9.30pm and go to bed.
